description:
An update for "Steel Diver™: Sub Wars" is now available from Nintendo eShop.

All customers who own a copy of “Steel Diver™: Sub Wars” should download the update.

This will update the software to Version 4.1 with the following amendments:

- Reverts the angle at which submarines surface to their Version 3.0 status.
name:
Steel Diver™: Sub Wars:
Update
